overview:
Kevin has spent the past 6 years developing his skills in the digital realm, launching a number of successful and nationally recognized web based projects and ran an LA based digital marketing firm. He has headed the development and marketing for numerous web platforms and is known for combining creative and innovative strategies with his new media knowledge.

Kevin attended the University of Southern California, Marshall School of Business in 2009 and currently resides as a Managing Partner of Inflite Group.
